titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the depreciation adjustments required in computing alternative minimum taxable income.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the depreciation adjustments required in computing alternative minimum taxable income.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal provisions requiring adjustments to depreciation in calculating alternative minimum taxable income. Eliminates certain accelerated depreciation as an item of tax preference for purposes of the alternative minimum tax.
